game.name: Big Hunter Online
game.description: Take your hunting to a whole new level when you stream. Hunt the primeval gigantic animals! People were starving to death because of continuous droughtsThe leader of the tribe goes out for hunting every day for living. Earn money and buy new weapons to hunt big animals and make the best scores.
